dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Shows topography, drainage, places of historical interest; plan of the city of Jerusalem.
The original map was drawn ca. 1320 by Pietro Vesconte, but was originally published in print in this edition.
Appears in Marino Sanuto's Liber secretorum fidelium crucis. Hanau: Christian Wechelius.
